result.reason: Race condition in ConnectionWindow disposal — ClosePanelIfEmpty() queues Close via BeginInvoke but concurrent panel/tab operations access the already-disposed window
result.approach: Add IsDisposed guards before accessing ConnectionWindow in ClosePanelIfEmptyOnUiTick(), MoveConnectionTabToPanel(), and MoveToPanelMenu_DropDownOpening(); re-validate panel state after BeginInvoke dequeue before calling Close(); add try-catch for ObjectDisposedException in QueueCloseTab()
